name: Planetoid
description: Planetoid is a physics based building game in which you construct facilities and protect humanoids on the planetoid. Build a facilities which can defeat the enemies on your way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2.2Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1800 MB available space
